
## Part 2: R Markdown for gapminder data exploration

This will detail some basic functions for extracting and visualizing information from the given dataframe: gapminder

```{r,gapminder}

library(gapminder)
```

### Extracting information about the dataframe 

##### Viewing the first six lines 

```{r, echo=FALSE}
head(gapminder)
```

##### Viewing the dataframe type

```{r}
str(gapminder)
```
#### Retrieving a summary of the dataframe

```{r}
summarize(gapminder)
```

### Visualizing data from the dataframe

```{r, echo=FALSE}
plot(gapminder$lifeExp)
```
